Container.Name: muninn
Container.Overview: Voice-first journaling app with AI-powered organization. Record audio journal entries, get automatic transcription via Whisper, and AI-powered analysis and tagging via Claude.
Container.Requires: Google OAuth credentials, Anthropic API key, Whisper STT endpoint

Config.Name: Data Directory
Config.Description: Persistent data storage (database, audio files, markdown exports)

Config.Name: Certs Directory
Config.Description: TLS certificates directory (optional - leave empty if using Tailscale Funnel)

Config.Name: Google Client ID
Config.Description: Google OAuth Client ID from console.cloud.google.com

Config.Name: Session Secret
Config.Description: Random 32+ character string for session encryption

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: Anthropic API key for Claude analysis (sk-ant-...)

Config.Name: Allowed Email
Config.Description: Restrict access to single Google account (optional)

Config.Name: Google Redirect URI
Config.Description: OAuth callback URL - set if using custom domain (e.g., https://journal.example.com/auth/callback)

Config.Name: Enable TLS
Config.Description: Enable HTTPS (disable if using Tailscale Funnel or reverse proxy)

Config.Name: TLS Key Path
Config.Description: Path to TLS private key (inside container)

Config.Name: Data Dir (internal)
Config.Description: Internal data directory path (do not change)
